apiDoc.name: NegentropySyncProgressDetailed
apiDoc.description: Detailed negentropy sync progress display with stats, progress bar, and per-relay status. Shows sync statistics horizontally, percentage-based progress bar, and individual relay status with counts. Uses NegentrogySync builder pattern with Root, Stats, ProgressBar, and RelayStatus subcomponents. Perfect for detailed sync monitoring in settings or debug views.
